definition: palace
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
surname Gong
Imperial city watchtower (old)/fault/deficiency
surname Que
used in place of 缺 (old)/mistake

sentences.english: I dreamed of many imperial palaces in different styles.
sentences.chinese: 我夢到了許多風格各異的宮闕。

sentences.english: Thee fireworks ten thousand, Aoshan Palace on the sky.
sentences.chinese: 紫禁菸花一萬重，鰲山宮闕倚晴空。

definition: Longsha district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
fairyland/honorific: your homeland
marble pillar (ornamental column in front of places, tombs)
open grassland
the Milky Way
southern states of Wu and Chu/the middle and lower Yangtze valley
Hannan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei
solo part (in opera)/soliloquy
fabled island in Eastern sea, abode of immortals/same as Penglai 蓬萊|蓬莱
Baqiao District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
bejeweled jade palace (idiom); sumptuous dwelling
Jintai District of Baoji City 寶雞市|宝鸡市[Bao3 ji1 Shi4], Shaanxi
magnificent residence/splendid house
in large numbers/in force/lit. clouds bubbling up
